noSearch.title: Use The Filters Above
noSearch.message: The filters above allow you to adjust recipe results to your liking. If you would like to spice things up and get a list of random recipes, simply leave the form blank and click search!

noResults.title: No Results
noResults.message: There was nothing on the menu that matched your filter options. Try adjusting your selections.

home.title: Welcome to Chef at Home
home.description: With thousands of recipes to choose from, there is a recipe here for everyone. You will find appetizers, main courses, sides, and desserts. Step by step instructions are included, as well as a full list of ingredients that will be needed. Filter options are available to help you pin-point a dish that corresponds with your desired diet and cuisine.

meals.title: Mains Course Meals
meals.subtitle: Kiss hunger goodbye.
meals.description: Here you will find delicious recipes that make for great main courses. Whether you are cooking for one, enjoying a date night at home, or looking for something that will satisfy the whole family, there is a recipe here for you.

bites.title: Bites for Everyone
bites.subtitle: Finger food and snacks that are easy to eat.
bites.description: Bites consists of finger food and snacks that are easy to eat. These recipes help you create shareable dishes that will be great for parties and get-togethers, as well as quick snacks to hold you over to dinner.

appsAndSides.title: Appetizers & Sides
appsAndSides.subtitle: Complements for your main course.
appsAndSides.description: If you are looking for an appetizer or side to complement your main dish, Chef at Home has you covered. A great appetizer and side is just as important as the main course. These easy to follow recipes are necessary to complete your meal.

desserts.title: Indulge in Sweetness
desserts.subtitle: Satisfy that sweet tooth.
desserts.description: Hopefully you saved room for dessert (there is always room for dessert). We all love to enjoy something sweet every now and then, especially at the end of a meal. Put your baking skills to the test with cookies, cakes, brownies, and more!
